is a small town in Hulu Sungai Selatan regency, with

The highway is paved all the way from Banjarmasin but from Kandangan the road will be getting narrow. In wet season, the road around Nagara can be flooded. If your starting point is Banjarmasin, your best bet to reach Nagara is by renting car with driver. Unfortunately it's not easy to find English speaking driver. The other choice is using tour companies.

value: Locals catch fish in traditional way; some of the catches are dried under the sun to make dry fishes.
Exploring wetland area with Jukung/sampan. Please note that the jukung/sampan usually doesn't provide life vest.
